title: What Champions will be on Star Guardian 2019 Team?

replies.body: I don't care who else gets it as long as Taliyah is one of them

i think {{champion:498}} and {{champion:497}}  is better to look like this https://twitter.com/kittykwn/status/974647733750501376
,and everywhere where is xayah there is also rakan, and i think there will be added {{champion:498}} ,{{champion:497}} ,{{champion:55}} ,{{champion:142}} , and {{champion:1}} ,but Yasuo is also good idea https://twitter.com/leagueofaram/status/783339135046193152  https://i.pinimg.com/originals/4d/37/0a/4d370a10f4232ee057b46e9b3fc09978.jpg

Don't know how to make the icons on mobile.

Kayle blue
Morgana purple
(I like the idea of them being put on the same team and arguing over how to do things)

Katarina red (headcanon: Lux thinks her and garen are dating and is trying to protect her big brother from bad influences, kat isn't actually bad just misunderstood)

I like the idea of a human being fused with anivia who would be the familiar (as a legendary or ultimate) for the pink one, maybe blue if not on this exact team.

Then we really need a jungler star guardian, so for green a female jungle champ like Vi or Evelynn, but idk if either of those fit right. Eve could be a chance to have a darker take on the green theme, like how Syndra is a darker take on purple than Janna.
